author: mbenson
msg: use every available means to find the real value

author: norman
msg: Use protocols 1.5-SNAPSHOT and make use of the new protocols lifecycle interface. This is less a hack as it was before to load our handlers. This also will help to be able to easily fire up more then one instance of a protocolserver.

author: norman
msg: Add lifecycle support via the LifecycleAwareProtocolHandler interface. Also add an interface to load ProtocolHandlers, inject resources and call lifecycle methods. See PROTOCOLS-24

author: simonetripodi
msg: trying to add automagically the inverted Edge in UndirectedGraph is not successfully, switched back to a more traditional implementation where bi-directional edges have to be added explicitely
